statements: DELETE FROM dashboard_data WHERE organization_name = 'XYZ Corp';
DELETE FROM dashboard_data WHERE activity_name = 'Conference' AND organization_name = 'ABC Foundation';
DELETE FROM Report WHERE report_id = 5 AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Report WHERE report_name LIKE '%Sales%';
DELETE FROM participants WHERE participant_id IN (SELECT participant_id FROM activities WHERE activity_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM HumanitarianActivities WHERE location = 'Syria' AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM report WHERE author = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM location WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
